question: Which Indian IT Company has been recognized as one of world's best employers by the Top Employer Institute for the third consecutive year?
explanation: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has been recognized as one of world's best employers by the Top Employer Institute for the third consecutive year. TCS has been selected among 1,300 companies in 113 countries all over the world. It has been recognized by Top Employer Institute for its excellent employee offerings. TCS has received the Top Employers Global certification. It has received the latest Top Employer endorsement for 27 of its individual country teams in Europe, Asia Pacific, North America, Latin America and the Middle East. The Top Employer rankings are done based on nine factors: talent strategy, workforce planning, on-boarding, learning & development, performance management, leadership development, career & succession management, compensation & benefits and company culture.
